</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the data for hiding. objectWhereHide can be taken using [[findCover]]. hidePosition can be taken using [[getHideFrom]]. Command is not functional in ArmA 2.
<template lineStart="1"><title>warning</title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command is not implemented</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''setHideBehind''' [objectWhereHide, hidePosition] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [objectWhereHide, hidePosition]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> objectWhereHide: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> hidePosition: [[Array]] - format [[getHideFrom]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getHideFrom]], [[findCover]], [[isHidden]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
